translations: adj.贫困的；贫穷的；生活艰苦的（needy 的变形）

sentences.sentence: It will now go only to the neediest.
sentences.translation: 现在起将只发给最贫困的人民。

sentences.sentence: Even more schools have taken steps to reduce debt among their neediest students.
sentences.translation: 更多的学校都已采取措施，为最需要资助的学生减少债务。

sentences.sentence: Policies aimed at all young people will only make the neediest fall through the cracks.
sentences.translation: 面向所有年轻人的政策只会让其中最穷困的人掉向深渊。
